page.title: 08"The Gaines" (Brockhampton"
page.content: I am Chris Woods and I live with my parents at 'The Gaines'.Life today is very exiting because we have a new canoeing lake and a new roller skating track.The guests can play putting,foot ball,hockey and cricket.The land covers about five acres.Guest don't just come from{England},they also come from{France,West Germany,Austria, {Poland,Finland,America}and{Canada. It has changed by having a new consenatory and the swimming pool.Also some of out buildings have been converted into houses.The main change is since{1962,}it is a Christian Youth Centre,before it used to be a family home.The house was started to be built in{1670}and it was finished in{1713. The man who had it built was John Freeman,who was a Bristol Merchant.The house stayed in the Freeman family until about{1920.
